column1:
I don’t buy this video. Coronavirus is so small that masks aren’t really effective - so I doubt a CDC official would recommend a mask, much less text about a CDC strategy to minimize panic. 

I think there’s a threat, but doubt this vid.
Friendly reminder: If you've been carefully washing your hands, wearing a mask in public spaces and taking other pr… https://t.co/hVAyNEHpx6
